column1: Online database for the Sustainable Development Report 2023
This database contains the following information:

column2: Overall results for all countries, including index score, goal dashboard, and trend dashboard for all indicators and goals
List of indicators, bounds and thresholds
The SDR 2023 data for all countries; includes spillover score, raw values, normalized scores, dashboard ratings, trends & goal scores.
Raw data, including time series, for all countries by indicator
The SDG Index Score, and all goal and indicator scores, retroactively calculated across time using time series data that was carried forward in years with missing data.

column3: This data should be cited as:   Sachs, J.D., Lafortune, G., Fuller, G., Drumm, E. (2023). Implementing the SDG Stimulus. Sustainable Development Report 2023. Paris: SDSN, Dublin: Dublin University Press, 2023. 10.25546/102924
